mapper.select: SELECT my_no, my_origin_name, my_stored_name , my_introduce, my_size, my_content_type FROM mypage WHERE my_no= #{mNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, RES.* FROM ( SELECT PJ.p_no, PJ.m_no, PJ.p_name, PJ.p_progress_state, I.i_stored_name, I.i_end_date FROM payment PM INNER JOIN project PJ ON PM.p_no = PJ.p_no INNER JOIN information I ON PM.p_no = I.p_no WHERE PM.m_no = #{mNo} AND PM.paym_state = 'Y' ORDER BY PM.paym_date DESC ) RES ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
